import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import './loginwindow.scss' function LoginWindow(props) { const { register, handleSubmit, watch, errors } = useForm(); const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(data); let formData = new FormData(); formData.append('username', data['username']); formData.append('password', data['password']) formData.append('remember_me', 'false') fetch("http://localhost:5000/hello", { method: 'get' }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data) }) } return

} export default LoginWindow;
